text: Dunfermline (Scottish Gaelic: Dùn Phàrlain) is a city in Fife, Scotland. It sits on high ground three miles from the northern shore of the Firth of Forth, northwest of Edinburgh, and was an ancient capital of Scotland.Dunfermline.info Retrieved 7th September 2008McEwan Bert Dunfermline The Post War Years 2004, p.9. It is home to Dunfermline Athletic F.C. who play at East End Park. ==Twin towns== * Sarasota, Florida, USA ==References== Category:Towns in Fife
title: Dunfermline
